author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

Includes the migration of all HLT configurations to the `12_3_0_pre2` template, and the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

  - [CMSHLT-2200](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2200): update of CSC-segment producer and GEMs in L2 and L3 muon reconstruction
  - [CMSHLT-2202](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2202): fixes for output of PPS calibration paths

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X` + migration to `12_3_0_pre2` template
